## Trashcan.getBoundingRectangle() method

Returns the bounding rectangle of the UI element in pixel units relative to the Blockly injection div.  The UI elements's bounding box. Null if bounding box should be ignored by other UI elements.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getBoundingRectangle(): Rect | null;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

Rect \| null
